txt.en: Many Fumaroles and Fire Grims thrive under the embrace of the Ghâshghurm. You should defeat them lest the otherworldly lake gain more power over the ash and soot-choked lands.
You have defeated many Fumaroles and Fire Grims in Talath Úrui. This surely makes traversing the lava lake slightly easier.
Fumaroles and Fire Grims can be found in Talath Úrui, mainly near the Ghâshghurm.\n\nYou should defeat any Fumaroles and Fire Grims that you encounter.
Defeated many Fumaroles and Fire Grims in Talath Úrui.
Fumaroles and Fire Grims both thrive under the embrace of the Ghâshghurm.
